settings.text_title: We have been waiting for the G-Sonic to arrive and finally we have a limited amount in stock
settings.text:
Groovewasher has informed us that this delay was due to a chain of misfortunate events. First, a packaging supplier misplaced a shipment of boxes for the G-Sonic, and secondly, being pushed back in the queue made it even worse.

But the wait is over and go right ahead and order here:

settings.text_title: Twelve Inch no longer distributor in Europe
settings.text:
We have decided to focus on our Twelve Inch line of products and this means Groovewasher products will no longer be available in our webshop. This has been a difficult decision to make as we love their products. We use it every day playing our records.

One of the reasons behind this is the challenges with shipping from the US to Europe. High rates and administration, make it more than difficult to maintain a sound business.

We will continue our good relationship with Groovewasher and support them until a new import setup is in place. Until then, we recommend you to find the Groovewasher products at the following dealers and webshops:

UK - Juno Records - https://www.juno.co.uk

UK - Walvis - www.walvisproducts.co.uk

DE - VinylNerds - https://vinylnerds.de

EU - Amazon - search for it.

NL - Walvis - www.walvisproducts.nl
